neighbors.name: Abram P. Dye & Carrie N. Dye
neighbors.claims: Abram P. Dye and Carrie N. Dye are listed as owners of a rural parcel in Saline County, Kansas (parcel ID 085128270000000700001) [Saline County Parcel Search](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Appraiser/parcelsearch). They have not been publicly involved or quoted in local discussions about development or energy projects [Salina Post](https://salinapost.com). There is no record of either holding a public office or leadership position in the county [Saline County Commission](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Government/County).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a trusted local farmer or community member start a personal conversation, emphasizing respect for their farmland and assuring that any project impact on their land and roads will be minimized.

neighbors.name: Judith L. Sapegin
neighbors.claims: Judith L. Sapegin is the recorded owner of a Saline County parcel in a rural area (ID 085128280000000700001) according to county records [Saline County Parcel Search](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Appraiser/parcelsearch). No public comments from Sapegin about local development or clean energy issues have been found in local news sources [Salina Post](https://salinapost.com). She does not appear to serve in any local government capacity or civic leadership role [Saline County Commission](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Government/County).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage her one-on-one in a respectful manner, highlighting how the plan will protect her land and family legacy, and clarify long-term safeguards for her property.

neighbors.name: Sabrina T.S. Ozisik & Hakan Ozisik
neighbors.claims: Hakan Ozisik and Sabrina T.S. Ozisik jointly own a tract of land in rural Saline County (parcel ID 085128280000000600001), according to county property records [Saline County Parcel Search](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Appraiser/parcelsearch). Neither of the Ozisiks has publicly stated a position on local development or renewable energy in available news records [Salina Post](https://salinapost.com). They are not known to hold any local public office or to be active in community organizations [Saline County Commission](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Government/County).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in a neighborly way focused on how noise, traffic, and views will be managed during the project, to address any concerns about their privacy and property values.

overview_summary: All three neighbors have an unknown stance (none have openly supported or opposed the project). Their community influence appears limited, as no high-influence neighbors were identified among them.
